page.title: 13CHILDRENS' GAMES IN STRETTON
page.content:
At school most children play games like: Hopscotch, Chase, Tick, Blackout, Budge, Skipping, Polo, Off ground tick and Gooley ghosty. British bulldogs is another well known game that everybody likes. It is an easy game. You just try to run from circle to circle without being caught. Everybody seems to like all these games but the boys and Netball do not seem to fit.
When it is raining we have to go in and play cards or draw or just read. But if it is a nice sunny day children are allowed to go down the field to play if they like. These are some of the games children play in Church Stretton.
